Name: TogepinScorer
Notes: A controller for The Chimp's Bowling Challenge which sets up the mini-game whereas the individual Pinheads need to be linked to it. The controller itself needs to be linked to a TogepinAttackMan instance. The player needs to score 5000 points in order to win.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated when the mini-game starts and deactivated again when it ends.

SW_B.Description: Gets activated when the player is inside a TogepinAttackFoulArea.

LinkNamePos.Description: Additional placements that need to be linked to the object.
